The screenshot also shows that "Descending" is selected, which means the videos will be sorted by size in descending order.
The user has successfully filtered the videos by size.
The user needs to click "OK" to apply the filter. However, the task is to determine whether they have accomplished their goal, and they have selected the correct options.
